page.title: 06Employment and Occupations.
page.content: Many of the jobs in this area are still connected with the land although there is a steady decline as the years pass.The next page details the various occupations. It can be seen that out of the 97 jobs listed 31 are on the land whilst 4 people are unemployed. There are 26 housewives,two of which are teachers bringing up families. There are 36 people following other occupations. A few people have two jobs and are recorded twice, eg. a lad with forestry training is setting up his own sweep's business in father's footsteps. Some occupations are difficult to catagorise. The man responsible for the care of 'phone boxes is noted under "cleaner"."Man"or "Master" is for convenience and does {not denote sex.}Indeed there is one postmistress!{Blue lettering}indicates retired (11 people) or past employment
